scripts.start:clean: yarn workspace @trezor/suite-native clean && yarn workspace @trezor/suite-native start -- --reset-cache
scripts.bundle:android: yarn workspace @trezor/suite-native react-native bundle --entry-file packages/suite-native/index.js --bundle-output ./android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest ./android/app/src/main/res --platform android --dev false
scripts.build:android: rimraf packages/suite-native/android/app/build && yarn workspace @trezor/suite-native bundle:android --reset-cache && cd ./android && ./gradlew bundleRelease -x bundleReleaseJsAndAssets --no-build-cache && ./gradlew assembleRelease -x bundleReleaseJsAndAssets --no-build-cache
